CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 PSCs based on bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) architecture are of particular interests since high performance devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) exceed 8% can be achieved.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. Bulk - heterojunction (BHJ): A type of architecture used in polymer solar cells
3. 1-3: A specific type of PSCs, likely referring to a particular arrangement of the components in the BHJ architecture.
4. PCE: Power conversion efficiencies.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. Polymer Solar Cells (PSCs)
2. Bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) architecture.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. Polymer Solar Cells (PSCs)
2. Bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) architecture.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer Solar Cells (PSCs) |
| Bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) architecture |
